name: SongPlayHistory
desc_en:
# SongPlayHistory
Track all your scores and song votes. Now comes with ScorePercentage included!

For information on the Vote and Play history data API, see [GitHub README](https://github.com/qe201020335/SongPlayHistory#for-modders).

## Features
- Keep detailed track of your plays
- Show how many times you've played a single beatmap
- Interop with BeatSaverVoting and DiTails to track your vote
- Visualize your song preferences (üëç/üëé) (if you don't have BeatSaverVoting installed)

![Screenshot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/qe201020335/SongPlayHistory/refs/heads/master/Screenshot.png)
